attributes.name: acquirerId
attributes.description: ID of the acquirer of the fixed asset on disposal.

attributes.name: approvedBy
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

attributes.name: approvedByDate
attributes.description: The date the entry was approved.

attributes.name: businessUnitCode
attributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

attributes.name: costRetired
attributes.description: Amount of cost retired from the asset.

attributes.name: enteredBy
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

attributes.name: enteredDate
attributes.description: The date on which the fixed asset removal was entered onto the system. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

attributes.name: fixedAssetId
attributes.description: ID associated with fixed asset.

attributes.name: fixedAssetRealizedGainLossAccount
attributes.description: Account to which realised gains or losses on assets is posted in the GL.

attributes.name: fixedAssetRealizedGainLossAmount
attributes.description: Amount of realised gain or loss on the fixed asset disposal.

attributes.name: fixedAssetRemovalCashProceedsAmount
attributes.description: Cash proceeds received on removal of the fixed assets.

attributes.name: fixedAssetRemovalDate
attributes.description: The date when the fixed asset is removed for sale or discarding.

attributes.name: fixedAssetRemovalNonCashProceedsAmount
attributes.description: Fixed asset removal proceeds value other than cash proceeds which can include exchange with other fixed assets, debt securities or other rights to payment.

attributes.name: fixedAssetRemovalsId
attributes.description: ID associated with removals of the asset.

attributes.name: fixedAssetUnrealizedGainLossAccount
attributes.description: Account to which unrealised gains or losses on assets is posted in the GL.

attributes.name: fixedAssetUnrealizedGainLossAmount
attributes.description: Amount of change in value of asset not yet realised.

attributes.name: glAccount
attributes.description: Identifier of GL Account on which removal transaction is posted. glAccountNumber in this file must match the glAccountNumber used in the glDetail, trialBalance and chartOfAccounts

attributes.name: glTransactionId
attributes.description: Transaction ID in the GL for the transaction recognising asset removals.

attributes.name: lastModifiedBy
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

attributes.name: lastModifiedByDate
attributes.description: The modifying date of the last person modifying the fixed asset removal entry.

attributes.name: lotNumber
attributes.description: Identification number assigned to a particular quantity or lot of material or depending on the asset classified.

attributes.name: reductionRate
attributes.description: Depreciation reduction percentage for the group and its member assets.

attributes.name: removalType
attributes.description: Type of fixed asset removal.

attributes.name: saleAmount
attributes.description: Amount received from the sale of an asset.

attributes.name: segment01
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment02
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment03
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment04
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment05
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: serialNumber
attributes.description: Serial number for asset, used by manufacturer for identification.

attributes.name: soldTo
attributes.description: Name of the party to whom the asset was sold as part of retirement.

attributes.name: taxCode
attributes.description: Code used to identify taxes relevant to the transaction.

attributes.name: terminalGainLoss
attributes.description: Option indicating how terminal gain or loss should be recognized for member asset retirement.

attributes.name: tradeInAssetId
attributes.description: Asset identification number of the new asset for which the retired asset was traded in.

attributes.name: transactionFees
attributes.description: The transaction fees to be incurred for the fixed asset removal.

attributes.name: uniqueId
attributes.description: ID associated with removals made to the fixed asset.

attributes.name: userDefined1
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: userDefined2
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.
